<p><a data-i13n="cpos:1;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/amazon-prime-day/">Amazon Prime Day</a> has been a summer mainstay for years at this point and this year is no exception. Prime Day will return on July 8 to July 11 this year, marking the first time the shopping event has been more than 48-hours long. That just means you’ll have more time to shop the deals, but really, you don't even have to wait until the official start date to save. Amazon typically always has early Prime Day deals in the lead-up to the event, and this year we’re already seeing some solid discounts on gadgets we like. Here, we’ve gathered all of the best Prime Day deals you can get right now, and we’ll keep updating this post as we get close to Prime Day proper.</p> 
<h2 id="jump-link-prime-day-deals-under-50">Prime Day deals under $50</h2> 
<p>
 <core-commerce id="189c2a176940487fb0c734c60d27b163" data-type="product-list" data-original-url="https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0CJM1GNFQ?th=1"></core-commerce></p> 
<p><a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:2;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=bec9da9e-a685-4b78-b532-f9061aa7a3a3&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Audible+Premium+Plus+%28three+months%29+for+%243+%28%2442+off%29%3A&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAASHSyb8G1SNdfqggYIUMMJgby0B5BcGgOaauFNcHvfgu&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FAudible-Books-and-Originals%2Fb%3Fnode%3D18145289011" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/Audible-Books-and-Originals/b?node=18145289011&amp;"><strong>Audible Premium Plus (three months) for $3 ($42 off):</strong></a> New subscribers can get three months of Audible for only $3, which represents a $42 discount. The Premium Plus tier gives you one book credit per month to use on any audiobook the service has, and you can stream any of the included titles for free on top of that. Audible also has members-only sales and discounts that you'll be able to take advantage of, too. The deal runs through July 31.</p> <span id="end-legacy-contents"></span>
<p><a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:3;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0CCC69HN3&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=bec9da9e-a685-4b78-b532-f9061aa7a3a3&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Samsung+SmartTag+2+for+%2418.50+%2838+percent+off%29%3A&amp;custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL2RwL0IwQ0NDNjlITjM_dGFnPWdkZ3QwYy0yMCIsImNvbnRlbnRVdWlkIjoiYmVjOWRhOWUtYTY4NS00Yjc4LWI1MzItZjkwNjFhYTdhM2EzIiwib3JpZ2luYWxVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL2RwL0IwQ0NDNjlITjMiLCJkeW5hbWljQ2VudHJhbFRyYWNraW5nSWQiOnRydWUsInNpdGVJZCI6InVzLWVuZ2FkZ2V0IiwicGFnZUlkIjoiMXAtYXV0b2xpbmsiLCJmZWF0dXJlSWQiOiJ0ZXh0LWxpbmsifQ&amp;signature=AQAAAfV90UWRHU8PH2GtyQqsK3blGgbfj4qWHPz-J3pFKOmT&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fdp%2FB0CCC69HN3" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0CCC69HN3?th=1"><strong>Samsung SmartTag 2 for $18.50 (38 percent off):</strong></a> Samsung users looking to keep track of their stuff need look no further than the SmartTag 2. One of our top picks for the <a data-i13n="cpos:4;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/computing/accessories/best-bluetooth-tracker-140028377.html">best Bluetooth trackers</a>, this accessory easily attaches to keys, bags and other items and uses Samsung's large finding network to show you their last known location.</p> 
<p><a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:5;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B09NRG4GK3&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=bec9da9e-a685-4b78-b532-f9061aa7a3a3&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Anker+633+10K+magnetic+battery+pack+for+%2443+%2828+percent+off%2C+Prime+exclusive%29%3A&amp;custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL0Fua2VyLU1hZ25ldGljLUZvbGRhYmxlLVdpcmVsZXNzLVBvcnRhYmxlL2RwL0IwOU5SRzRHSzM_&amp;signature=AQAAARB7tuuZfA4xfK19ZZBx6pxb4uOssVHoumBqJCGvgaFR&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FAnker-Magnetic-Foldable-Wireless-Portable%2Fdp%2FB09NRG4GK3" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/Anker-Magnetic-Foldable-Wireless-Portable/dp/B09NRG4GK3?th=1"><strong>Anker 633 10K magnetic battery pack for $43 (28 percent off, Prime exclusive):</strong></a> This 10K battery pack attaches magnetically to the backs of iPhones, making it easy to recharge while on the go. It also has a built-in kickstand for easy video watching or FaceTime calling while powering up.</p> 
<p><a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:6;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0B1N5HW22&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=bec9da9e-a685-4b78-b532-f9061aa7a3a3&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Blink+Outdoor+4+%28one+camera+system%29+for+%2445+%2855+percent+off%29%3A&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAWM5fkHJEG-dOiX9RiLNTelr8yAqMc9gCwfeDA_ZyN2k&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FBlink-Outdoor-4th-Gen-1-Camera%2Fdp%2FB0B1N5HW22" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/Blink-Outdoor-4th-Gen-1-Camera/dp/B0B1N5HW22?ref_=ast_sto_dp&amp;th=1"><strong>Blink Outdoor 4 (one camera system) for $45 (55 percent off):</strong></a> These <a data-i13n="cpos:7;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/home/smart-home/best-security-camera-130035012.html">security cameras</a> are some of our favorites, and you can start building a system for your home with this pack that includes one Outdoor 4 camera and one Sync Module 2. These Blink cameras record 1080p video, support two-way talk and deliver speedy and accurate motion alerts to your phone. You don't need a subscription to save footage either; just use a thumb drive with the Sync Module 2 to save clips locally.</p>

<p>

<p><a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:8;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0D1XD1ZV3&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=bec9da9e-a685-4b78-b532-f9061aa7a3a3&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=AirPods+Pro+2+for+%24199+%2820+percent+off%29%3A&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAARGKwrdez6U5ITv2CJHuYkuo9xhpruZYEhraRofXjpJz&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fdp%2FB0D1XD1ZV3%2F" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0D1XD1ZV3/"><strong>AirPods Pro 2 for $199 (20 percent off):</strong></a> The AirPods Pro 2 remain Apple’s best set of wireless earbuds, as they offer the full set of Apple-focused features, strong ANC, onboard volume controls, a comfy in-ear design and a warm sound profile that most should find agreeable. They can even<a data-i13n="cpos:9;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/audio/headphones/how-to-use-apples-airpods-pro-2-as-a-hearing-aid-173049967.html"> work as a hearing aid</a>. Their six-hour battery life still isn’t the best, though, and you should only get them if you’re all-in on Apple hardware. But if that’s the case, we consider them the<a data-i13n="cpos:10;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/audio/headphones/best-wireless-earbuds-120058222.html"> best wireless earbuds</a> for iPhone owners.</p> 
<p><a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:11;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0DGHMNQ5Z&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=bec9da9e-a685-4b78-b532-f9061aa7a3a3&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Apple+AirPods+4+for+%24119+at+Amazon+%28%2410+off%29&amp;custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL0FwcGxlLUJsdWV0b290aC1IZWFkcGhvbmVzLVBlcnNvbmFsaXplZC1FZmZvcnRsZXNzL2RwL0IwREdITU5RNVo_&amp;signature=AQAAAepGsBKUeN4vu66dm_M4p2LqI1JqYxI9ekqHq-D4eZ7Z&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FApple-Bluetooth-Headphones-Personalized-Effortless%2Fdp%2FB0DGHMNQ5Z" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/Apple-Bluetooth-Headphones-Personalized-Effortless/dp/B0DGHMNQ5Z?th=1"><strong>Apple AirPods 4 for $119 at Amazon ($10 off)</strong></a>: Apple’s wireless earbuds don't have the best sound quality or battery life, and this entry-level model lacks wireless charging, Find My tracking and onboard volume controls. But it still gets you tons of Apple-friendly features — from fast pairing with iCloud devices to spatial audio to hands-free Siri — and its lightweight design should fit most ears better than previous AirPods.</p> 
<p><a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:12;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0DGHYQ1VJ&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=bec9da9e-a685-4b78-b532-f9061aa7a3a3&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Apple+Watch+Series+10+for+%24299+%28%24100+off%29%3A&amp;custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL2RwL0IwREdIWVExVko_dGFnPWdkZ3QwYy0yMCIsImNvbnRlbnRVdWlkIjoiYmVjOWRhOWUtYTY4NS00Yjc4LWI1MzItZjkwNjFhYTdhM2EzIiwib3JpZ2luYWxVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL2RwL0IwREdIWVExVkoiLCJkeW5hbWljQ2VudHJhbFRyYWNraW5nSWQiOnRydWUsInNpdGVJZCI6InVzLWVuZ2FkZ2V0IiwicGFnZUlkIjoiMXAtYXV0b2xpbmsiLCJmZWF0dXJlSWQiOiJ0ZXh0LWxpbmsifQ&amp;signature=AQAAAcQcjNOwWxDbiAKMoptoY9v3Qfel5xjkz1TK5IqaWKaC&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fdp%2FB0DGHYQ1VJ" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0DGHYQ1VJ?th=1"><strong>Apple Watch Series 10 for $299 ($100 off):</strong></a> We consider Apple’s flagship wearable to be the<a data-i13n="cpos:13;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/wearables/best-smartwatches-153013118.html"> best smartwatch</a> you can buy, period. It's a <a data-i13n="cpos:14;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/wearables/apple-watch-series-10-review-legacy-and-sequel-in-equal-measure-120021405.html">mostly iterative update</a>, with faster charging, a slightly slimmer design and a marginally larger display than the prior Series 9. That said, it's still a comprehensive fitness tracker, and no other smartwatch can integrate as neatly with iPhones and other Apple devices.</p> 
<p><a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:15;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0DZDC3WW5&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=bec9da9e-a685-4b78-b532-f9061aa7a3a3&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Apple+MacBook+Air+%2813-inch%2C+M4%29+for+%24849+%2815+percent+off%29%3A&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAUWv4Q2N6305DQnZ6veP8KDhN73izhzY9UiJBdueXlKW&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fdp%2FB0DZDC3WW5%2F" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0DZDC3WW5/?th=1"><strong>Apple MacBook Air (13-inch, M4) for $849 (15 percent off):</strong></a> Apple continues to iterate on its most affordable laptop, and the M4 is the best Air yet. We consider this to be the <a data-i13n="cpos:16;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/computing/laptops/best-laptops-120008636.html">best laptop</a> for most people, thanks to its excellent performance, thing-and-light design, comfortable keyboard and trackpad and excellent battery life.</p>

It includes an Intel Core M3 processor, 8GB of RAM, 64GB of storage and a 12-hour battery life.</p>

It's Qi2-compliant for fast charging, and it has a kickstand built in so you can more easily use your phone with the power bank as well.</p>

It also supports Bluetooth audio, so you can play music from it when you're not using it with your TV.&nbsp;</p>

<h2 id="jump-link-what-is-prime-day">What is Prime Day?</h2> 
<p>Prime Day is Amazon's members-only shopping event, which means you’ll have to be a Prime subscriber on Prime Day to take advantage of most of the savings. Amazon still offers a<a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:44;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=bec9da9e-a685-4b78-b532-f9061aa7a3a3&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=30-day+free+trial&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAY9G7Vv8U1uAzPifCKUV7x-37R6HsBwjlg2JDvSLtryY&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Famazonprime" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/amazonprime?"> 30-day free trial</a> to new Prime subscribers, so you can start your free trial closer to July and participate in the event.</p> 
<h2 id="jump-link-when-is-prime-day-2025">When is Prime Day 2025?</h2> 
<p><a data-i13n="cpos:45;pos:1" href="https://www.aboutamazon.com/news/retail/amazon-prime-day-july-2025">Amazon Prime Day 2025</a> will be back this year on July 8 through July 11.</p> 
<h2 id="jump-link-how-often-is-prime-day">How often is Prime Day?</h2> 
<p>Amazon Prime Day typically comes around annually in July. In the last few years, Amazon has also had its "Big Deal Days" in October, which is effectively a second Prime Day and the unofficial kickoff to the holiday shopping season.</p> 
<h2 id="jump-link-how-does-prime-day-work">How does Prime Day work?</h2> 
<p>Prime subscribers can go to Amazon's site on Prime Day to see all of the exclusive deals they have access to. Prime subscribers do not have to do anything additional to get Prime Day sales: the discounts you see on product pages will show up in your cart automatically. If you're not a Prime subscriber and you go to Amazon to shop on Prime Day, you'll likely see tons of items on sale but only "with Prime;" those discounts will not be available to those who are not active Prime subscribers.</p> 
<h2 id="jump-link-is-prime-day-only-for-prime-members">Is Prime Day only for Prime members?</h2> 
<p>Technically yes, but even if you do not pay for a Prime membership, you should still check out Amazon on Prime Day. While most Prime Day deals will be exclusively available to subscribers, there are always a handful of sales available to all shoppers. Amazon distinguishes between them very clearly: you'll see "Prime exclusive" on product pages near the deal pricing on the discounts that are only available to paying members.</p> 
<p>Separately, it’s very likely that other retailers like Walmart, Target and Best Buy will have their own competing Prime Day sales during that time frame, too. So if you're not keen on shopping at Amazon at all, it's worth checking out other retailers during the week of Prime Day to see if they are matching Prime Day deal prices.</p>This article originally appeared on Engadget at https://www.engadget.com/deals/amazon-prime-day-2025-the-best-early-deals-to-shop-now-dates-and-everything-else-you-need-to-know-120028780.html?src=rss
